recto.line: ñcā śaṃ cā tu ṣpa ñcā śaṃ tra yo pa ñcā śaṃ dvā pa ñcā śaṃ e ka pa ñcā śaṃ pa ñc[ā] śa[ṃ] va rṣ[ā] ṇāṃ ś[ai] [yyā]
sa naṃ grā ha yā mi ta ta ḥ pa ścā de ko na pa ñcā śa dva rṣā ṇāṃ a ṣṭa ca tvā riṃ śa dyā va taṃ
ca tvā ri ñśa dva rṣā ṇāṃ śai yyā sa naṃ grā ha yā mi ta ta ḥ pa ścā e ko na ca tvā ri
ñśa dyā va taṃ tri ñśa ti va rṣā ṇāṃ a ne na pa ryā ye ṇa a va rṣi kā nāṃ śai yyā
sa na[ṃ] grā ha yā mi ta ta ḥ pa ścā cchra ma ṇo nde śā nāṃ śai yyā sa naṃ grā ha yā mi sa rve ṣāṃ
ya thā vṛ ddhi ka[ṃ] śa yyā sa naṃ grā ha yi ta vyaṃ ta tsa rve ṣāṃ vi di ta ma stu || te

verso.line: a nta ra va y· c· r· tya ma ṣlo [na] || sa ma tvā [ṇo] [t]u me ā yu ṣma [n]ta [ḥ] [a]
ha[ṃ] a rya so mo bhi kṣu rglā no ma ha lla ka ḥ saṃ ghā nmā rge da ṇḍa śi kya sa nma
tiṃ yā cā mi saṃ gho me a rya so ma sya bhi kṣo glā na sya ma ha l[l]a ka
mā rge da ṇḍa śi kya sa[ṃ] ma tiṃ sa nma nya tu • a nu ka mpā mu pā dā ya
e vaṃ dvi ra pi tri ra pi || te sa ṣpī ki ye ya ska ṢṢA lya || śṛ ṇo tu bha da nta ḥ saṃ
gha ḥ a yaṃ a rya so mo bhi kṣu rglā no na ha lla ka ḥ saṃ ghā nmā rge da ṇḍa sa mma tiṃ

transcription.prose:
…ñcāśaṃ cātuṣpañcāśaṃ trayopañcāśaṃ dvāpañcāśaṃ ekapañcāśaṃ pañcāśaṃ varṣāṇāṃ śaiyyā
sanaṃ grāhayāmi tataḥ paścād ekonapañcāśad varṣāṇāṃ aṣṭacatvāriṃśad yāvataṃ
catvāriñśad varṣāṇāṃ śaiyyāsanaṃ grāhayāmi tataḥ paścā ekonacatvāri
ñśad yāvataṃ triñśati varṣāṇāṃ anena paryāyeṇa avarṣikānāṃ śaiyyā
sanaṃ grāhayāmi tataḥ paścāc chramaṇondeśānāṃ śaiyyāsanaṃ grāhayāmi sarveṣāṃ
yathāvṛddhikaṃ śayyāsanaṃ grāhayitavyaṃ tat sarveṣāṃ viditam astu || te
antara va y· c· r· t yamaṣlona || samatvā ṇotu me āyuṣmantaḥ a
haṃ aryasomo bhikṣur glāno mahallakaḥ saṃghān mārge daṇḍaśikyasanma
tiṃ yācāmi saṃgho me aryasomasya bhikṣo glānasya mahallaka
mārge daṇḍaśikyasaṃmatiṃ sanmanyatu • anukampām upādāya
evaṃ dvir api trir api || tesa ṣpīkiye yaskaṣṣälya || śṛṇotu bhadantaḥ saṃ
ghaḥ ayaṃ aryasomo bhikṣur glāno nahallakaḥ saṃghān mārge daṇḍasammatiṃ

comments.comment: cātuṣpañcāśaṃ: the akṣara tu has been added under the line.
chramaṇondeśānāṃ: for chramaṇoddeśānāṃ; the akṣara ṇo has been added under the line.
aryasomo: the scribe originally wrote aryasomasya and corrected it afterwards.

comments.comment: Also numbered H.149.X.35. The ms. is Sanskrit, but has a Tocharian B postscript after the Sanskrit colophon. I have copied the recto from Hartmann’s and Hoernle’s editions and used these and Hoernle’s facsimile (l.c. facs. 4 on plate 3) for the verso.
